text: Hernandia cubensis is a species of plant in the Hernandiaceae family. It is endemic to Cuba. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Areces- Mallea, A.E. 1998. Hernandia cubensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. Category:Flora of Cuba Category:Hernandiaceae Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hernandia cubensis
